TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ModelService extends System.Object

Docs.summary: This class is the main entry point that the designer uses to interact with the model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The service has a split between public and protected methods that you must implement when you create a derived class. The public methods are callable by anyone. The protected methods are invoked by the model.

MemberSignature.Value: protected abstract System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem CreateStaticMemberItem (Type type, string memberName);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem CreateStaticMemberItem(class System.Type type, string memberName) cil managed
protected: abstract System::Activities::Presentation::Model::ModelItem ^ CreateStaticMemberItem(Type ^ type, System::String ^ memberName);

Docs.param: The type that contains the static member being referenced.
The name of the static member being referenced.
Docs.summary: Creates a new model item that represents the value of a static member of the given class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For example, to add a reference to `Brushes.Red` to the model, call this method with `typeof(Brushes)` and the string "Red" as the parameters. This will be serialized into XAML as `{x:Static Brushes.Red}`.

Docs.summary: Finds matching model items given a starting point from which to look.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem> Find(class System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem startingItem, class System.Predicate`1<class System.Type> match) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function Find (startingItem As ModelItem, match As Predicate(Of Type)) As IEnumerable(Of ModelItem)

Docs.param: The from which to start the search. Items above this item will be ignored. This item, and any item below it in the hierarchy, will be included in the search. If this value is , is used instead.
A predicate that allows more complex type matching to be used. This method will enumerate all items within the given parent scope that match the predicate.
Docs.summary: Finds matching model items given a starting point from which to look.
Docs.returns: An that contains all model items that match the query.

Docs.summary: Locates the in the given scope with the given name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Returns `null` if the model item could not be located.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride Event ModelChanged As EventHandler(Of ModelChangedEventArgs)

Docs.summary: This event is raised when something in the model has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The event arguments in the event can be used to find what has changed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Root As ModelItem

Docs.summary: The root of the object hierarchy.
Docs.value: The root of the model hierarchy as a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks For linear stores, the root is the first object in the store. For stores that represent a tree of objects, this returns the topmost node of the tree.
